localize.full_text: 监管机构对比特币和其他加密货币https://t.co/zHMuSIjZ0M发出直言不讳的警告：“做好输光所有钱的准备”

previous.excerpt: You know, you really shouldn't have to settle for emojis that only kind-of express how you feel. Punctuate your deepest sentiments and pull off those more-subtle remarks with this Very Necessary (and expanding) iMessage sticker pack.

localize.description: 你知道，你真的不应该满足于那些只能表达你感受的表情符号。用这个 "非常必要"(和扩展的)iMessage贴纸包来点缀你最深沉的情感，并拉出那些更微妙的评论。
你知道，你真的不應該滿足於那些只能表達你感受的表情符號。用這個 "非常必要"(和擴展的)iMessage貼紙包來點綴你最深沉的情感，並拉出那些更微妙的評論。

next.excerpt: Use all your favorite web apps in Wavebox instead of Chrome and save 90 minutes per day by automating tasks and staying focused. Wavebox has everything you need to work faster across Slack, Asana, Trello, and every other app you use to get work done.

localize.tagline: 所有你喜欢的网络应用都在Wavebox中，而不是在Chrome中。
